Articles.Content: Hey, I was wondering if anyone here could help me make an internal mod??

Are you asking for information on making interior spaces for command pods and such?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35714-Tutoria-Modifying-Exporting-Internals-in-20-Part-Tools?p=449925#post449925

If so I think this should help.
